pr_title: GEODE-7901: Redis testGetSet_shouldBeAtomic and testGetRange_rangePastEndOfValue_returnsEmptyString tests failing

timeline.message: Increase timeout to make reliable in CI

timeline.bodyText: Rather than hard-coding a wait limit, most Geode tests use GeodeAwaitility. The advantage of the latter is that we can (and have) set a global default maximum timeout (currently 5 minutes).
timeline.author: Bill

replies.bodyText: Aha! The part of the code we're working on is old enough that I don't think we've seen an example of that. Thanks for the tip - we'll adopt that going forward.
replies.author: ringles
